gpsMessage.title: GPS Message
gpsMessage.description: Flag that describes the following values

age.title: Age
age.description: Age of the measurement in seconds

horizontalAccuracy.title: Estimated horizontal position error
horizontalAccuracy.description: Estimated horizontal position error in meters

cog.title: Course over ground
cog.description: The direction the tracker is moving over the ground expressed in degrees.

sog.title: Speed over ground
sog.description: The speed the tracker is moving over the ground. It is expressed in cm/second.

cn0.title: Carrier 1 over noise
cn0.description: Carrier over noise (dBm) for the first satellite seen.

cn1.title: Carrier 2 over noise
cn1.description: Carrier over noise (dBm) for the second satellite seen.

cn2.title: Carrier 3 over noise
cn2.description: Carrier over noise (dBm) for the third satellite seen.

cn3.title: Carrier 4 over noise
cn3.description: Carrier over noise (dBm) for the fourth satellite seen.
